I am back with another sight. I didn't show any signs of life because of high school.
Anyway today we have a sight with Rias Gremory from High School DxD (peak anime in my opinion but has a lot of Echi scenes) 10/10


#anime #highschooldxd #dxd #rias #riasgremory #alltanks

Use on bmp2m circular sight.It contains the sight lines of atgm, 2a42 and ag-30
#bmp_2m#sight#circular
...

~HISTORICAL M71C TELESCOPE FOR M26, T25 AND T-26E1-1~
Requested by @speckiderkarpfen

  • Accurate M71C telescope for the M26 Pershing, premium M26 T99, T25 and the T26E1-1.
  • Should work for all tanks with M82 APCBC and 5x zoom.
  • Vertical lines are 200m, horizontal lines are 400m.
  • Horizontal lines are 5 mils with 5 mils between them.
  • The T-26E1-1 or T26E4 "Super Pershing" was meant to be fitted with an M71E4 telescope, but it was fitted with an M71C instead, so the ballistics won't match.

UPDATE 08/02-2024</...

Sights for T-10A and T-10M

Features:
- Distance corrections for 12.7/14.5mm MGs
- Number/Ticks for estimating the distance of a 3.3m-width target, such as Centurion and T-55
(From outside to the center, the number/ticks are for the target's visual width at 100, 200, 400, 600, 800 & 1600m)
- A design inspired by TPD-K1

Update on 2024.02.09
- Adjusted the green color for slightly improved readability under current game rendering

Installation:
Extract and drop the two folders into "UserSights" under the game folder

---

Merkava Mk.1 & Mk.2 custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! This sight is compatible with other tanks, but it will not fit the screen properly due to the different sight characteristics like FOV. This is only 100% compatible with the Mk.1 and 2 series of Merkava, including Merkava Mk.1 and 2 from the American Tech tree.

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord se...

Merkava Mk.3 custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! This sight is compatible with other tanks, but it will not fit the screen properly due to the different sight characteristics like FOV. This is only 100% compatible with the Mk.3 series of Merkava, including Mk.3D from the American Tech tree.

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Quite some time ago I made a simple sight for the Type 93
Welp, it's basically the same for the Type 81
I just prefer this to the good ole default WT cross hair that feels odd for a SAM

The square represents the lock radar range and the circle represents the seeker lock range
There's a little cutout on the top of the circle with the firing order of missiles
And above the square there's the rangefinder result

Sight is green when unlit, red when lit

#spaa #type81 #type_81 #type81sam #sam

#leopard2
Germ - Leopard2 A4/ A5 /A6 /PSO........Sight
Zoom:4.0x-12.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2a5

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_leopard_2a5

#alltanks
Imitate World of Tanks Ver 0.9.22 Menu Animation Sight

All vehicles can be used

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks


所有地面载具都可以使用这些瞄具，

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

注意 : 此瞄具分为快速弹与慢速弹两款 文件名过长 游戏设置内无法分辨 只能通过观察弹道标尺进行区分

HISTORICAL TOGS SIGHT FOR CHALLENGER MK.2 AND MK.3,DS

*Sight is made on base of sight from @TheSkyCrasher *
*Thanks for help to @Rastmust and @PotatoChips *

*Sight is for Challenger 1 only *

*Sight is made for 1920x1080 resolution*

VERSION 27.11.23.
-total reconstruction of sight to be as close to the historical as possible
-text reshaped
-brackets reshaped, put to the centre of the sight

VERSION 06.01.24.
-lines made thinner
-aiming reticle put more to the centre

VERSION 09.01.24.
-lines made thinner
-aiming reticle downsized,put more to the center again

VERSION ...

Pack of sights specially finalized for the event "Operation Maslenica" on Project Front. The main changes consist in adding a realistic field of view (FOV), as well as disabling the request for allies and rangefinder on those vehicles where it was historically absent.

The sights made by @RideR2, @Caff_Gunner, @РotatoСhiрs and @kuIoodporny were taken as a basis. Thank you for your sights.


#t_72a #t_72m1, #t_55a #t_34_85 #m18 #m36 #m36b2 #pt_76 #pt_76b #su_100 #zsu_57_2 #m53_59 #strela_10m2 #9m35m2 #ozelot

#type74c
#type74e

Sights for SPAA novices to get their target easier

Description:
The sights include a few circles to tell players how much offset is needed for shooting a target with given target speed, aspect and shell speed, despite how far it is or whether it is getting closer or farther.

Sights for Sd.Kfz. 6/2, Ostwind 1/2, Wirbelwind, Kugelblitz, Zerstorer 45, M42 Contraereo, R3 T20 FA-HS, ZSU57-2, WZ305 and BTR-ZD are included. There are also sights for BegleitPz 57 and VCC80/60 (yep, they work as SPAAGs for me)

Updated on 2024.06.15
